channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report X-2024030509
item.description:
Report X-2024030509

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-18T15:10:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-08
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin and taken to the HMPA. DescribePack: Loose cap allowed liquid to leak wetting and contaminating the contents and carton causing the carton to rip. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in bin.

item.title: Report X-2024030345
item.description:
Report X-2024030345

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-14T18:15:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-06
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was unloaded from trailer and sent on non-compatibles belt towards tugger line. Package was punctured and leaked prior to loading into delivery van. Package was removed from workflow and brought to QA cage for inspection. Package was placed in a plastic tote. DescribePack: Package has 1" punctured on its top, leaks when handled. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a plastic tote to prevent further release or seepage of flammable liquid.

item.title: Report X-2024030388
item.description:
Report X-2024030388

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-12T15:28:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-07
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg was dropped and placed in lined Hazmat bin and taken to the HMPA. DescribePack: There is a crack approximately 1/4 of the way around the bottom of the inner plastic container. One edge of the bottom closure ripped and tape failed allowing the inner container to fall out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.
